title: Critérium du Dauphiné stage 1: Christophe Laporte pips breakaway survivor Rune Herregodts
content:
Jumbo-Visma secures early GC lead after Laporte sprints past daylong breakaway rider Herregodts in heartbreaker finale.

Read the full article at Critérium du Dauphiné stage 1: Christophe Laporte pips breakaway survivor Rune Herregodts on Velo.
author: Jim Cotton
